yah no kidding, and I thought that Golden Chroma was HYPE lol

> [{quoted}](name=ARE YOU PC BRO,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=hEU73yOZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-28T22:37:23.333+0000)
>
> yah no kidding, and I thought that Golden Chroma was HYPE lol

Boy were we bamboozled
why so many karma skins lol is she even popular
You ask this about Karma but not Jhin, who now has 4 excellent skins while champs like Rek'Sai and Aurelion Sol have basically nothing.

Jhin only got a skin because zed did. To promote the marvel comic coming out this fall. I do agree though, that auralion sol is popular enough to get some more good skins. but, sadly rek'sai isnt all too popular right now. she needs a rework before a new skin.
Her last skin, Conqueror, was released in 2017 and before that, Winter Wonder, in 2016.  Warden being her last permanent store skin in 2015.  So it's been a bit of time.

I have seen few actual karma players, but the few I have seen were on 2mil to even 3 mil mastery points on her.

I was on low elo at the time so I can't imagine how they are at high elo.

Karma is plenty popular, but her die hard fans still want Riot to give her the update she deserves. She was supposed to be a battlemage who can go support, and Riot has really been pushing her into the support role instead of capitalizing on her dual role fantasy.
so was jhin originally cosmic and nows hes turned evil and is converting to dark star? also is this his lejhindary skin?

I am very happy about the karma skin, but the Icon is kinda disappointing when compered to the others: 


https://boosteria.org/guides/dark-star-league-skins
I love the dark star skin concept, but these designs and colors are off! Compared to thresh and varus, these are way too colorful and the design doesnt match up.
